body_html:
@wt-huang Thanks for the response.
I tried to find the shape(for finding the no of channels) of the image using scipy and opencv before using tensorflow
In both scipy and opencv when i read image and print it's shape it shows the no of channels as 3 and not 4.
It will be helpful if you can explain how you have decided the images to be RGBA image and not RGB image
